segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for cookies like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, and he doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for a handout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this while their mother is right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and they’re just focused on snacks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, but she’s part of this too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a recipe for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious the woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s balance is terrible, and he’s going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get hurt, but they really should know better.
segments.speaker: PAR
